title: Looking for your NEXT Rental?! Summerlin is the Place to BE! *SPECIALS
posting_body: ['Welcome to MorningStar Apartment Homes!', 'Our cozy apartment home community is ideally located near a wide selection of sophisticated shops, acclaimed schools, and award winning restaurants, along with commuter-friendly highways like the 215 which is easily accessible from the property .', 'Beautiful landscaping, access to pool and spa, and a spectacular clubhouse are just a few of the luxuries you will find here.', 'MorningStar Apartment Homes incorporates a wealth of recreational amenities and comfortable residences.', 'Come HOME to MorningStar Apartments TODAY!', '1 & 2 Bedroom Apartments:', 'Large Patio', 'Walk In Closet (s)', 'Relaxing Roman Tub', 'Fully Appointed Kitchen', 'Utility Room with Full Size Washer & Dryer', '*SOME come with 1 Car Attached Garage', 'FREE Amenities:', 'Pool and Spa', 'Fitness Center', 'Tennis Court', 'Basketball Court', 'Automated Gate Access', 'Spacious Downstairs 1bed1bath in Summerlin *Reserve yours Today!', 'Approved Pets Welcome!', 'CALL us at', 'show contact info', 'OR', 'Visit us at: <URL>']
